items.title: National Hurricane Center Tracks New Disturbance in Atlantic: What to Know
items.summary: A new disturbance has formed in the central tropical Atlantic, the National Hurricane Center (NHC) in Miami reported on Sunday. The system, known as a tropical wave, is located about 1,000 miles east-southeast...

items.title: Show HN: Browse the Web with Superpowers
items.summary: Superpowers is an open-source Chrome extension that adds AI browser capabilities, allowing users to browse the web with advanced features. Users can try it out without needing to create an account, join a waiting list, or pay for a subscription, and their data remains on their machine.

items.title: CVE-2025-53770: Frequently Asked Questions About Zero-Day SharePoint Vulnerability Exploitation
items.summary: Successful exploitation of CVE-2025-53770 could expose MachineKey configuration details from a vulnerable SharePoint Server, enabling unauthenticated remote code execution. Tenable’s Research Special Operations (RSO) team has compiled FAQs about the zero-day vulnerability.
